name: express-lit-docker
description: A fullstack starter for little projects based on express and lit, automatically packed into a docker container using a github action.

scripts.start: cd frontend; npm start & cd ../backend; npm start
scripts.docker:build: cp -a frontend/dist/* backend/public; docker build backend --tag express-lit --file Dockerfile
scripts.cleaninstall: cd frontend; npm ci && cd ../backend; npm ci

author: rednil
